author: Nathan Larkin
description: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass.Special ingredient #1: Homemade almond, pecan, cinnamon and maple syrup orgeatSpecial ingredient #2: Smoke & Oak Bitters
name: Mai Suit & Tai
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Italicus or other Rosolio di Bergamotto / bergamot liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
Special ingredient #1: Homemade almond, pecan, cinnamon and maple syrup orgeat
